# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
At this time, only the latest major version is supported with security updates.

## Reporting a Vulnerability
**Please do not post security issues to the issue tracker.**

You can email [ADO-Cloud-Services@northwestern.edu](mailto:ADO-Cloud-Services@northwestern.edu) with information about the vulnerability. This address is monitored by a team and will be responsive to your submission.

**Thank you** for reporting a vulnerability! :heart:
